content: Can you provide a MATLAB code to find the sum of all natural numbers less than 100?

Certainly! You can use the following MATLAB code to find the sum of all natural numbers less than 100:

```matlab
% Initialize the sum variable
sum_of_numbers = 0;

% Loop through all natural numbers less than 100
for i = 1:99
    sum_of_numbers = sum_of_numbers + i;
end

% Display the result
disp(['The sum of all natural numbers less than 100 is: ', num2str(sum_of_numbers)]);
```

When you run this code, it will calculate and display the sum of all natural numbers less than 100.
